reviewText: Although this DVD has a few interesting interviews with Jason, the title and description is very misleading. This is not a documentary about his beginnings in the business and how he came to achieve success. Rather, it is a collection of three filmed radio interviews from 2014 and 2015, mostly focusing on Jason's break-up with Jordin Sparks--with a little bit of discussion about his recent music and success. For the price and "unauthorized" factor, I wasn't expecting a miracle ... and I certainly didn't get one!
